metadata.title: CVE-2022-29153 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise up to 1.9.16, 1.10.9, and 1.11.4 mayallow server side request forgery when the Consul client agent followsredirects returned by HTTP health check endpoints. Fixed in 1.9.17,1.10.10, and 1.11.5.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
